title: ACM-CSS WEBSITE
description: This is the official website of PEC ACM student chapter. This is an Open-Source project. Feel free to contribute in it.

title: Stock Watchlist
description: An open source project developed by ACM-CSS, where you can keep an eye on how the market changes day-to-day.

title: MovieDroid
description: MovieDroid is a completely free and open source native android application that maintains an organized and categorized list of a user's favourite movies and TV shows. The app aims at helping a user keep track of the shows they have watched while keeping to up-to-date with the latest releases.
